roleset.name: subject to a cardioversion, correcting cardiac arrythmia using electric current or medication
roleset.note: CARDIOVERT-V NOTES: Based on sentences in temprel 5- strat 1. Comparison to cardioversion-n. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from cardiovert.01-v)

example.text: She-1 was recently cardioverted *-1 on 7/29/10 after amiodarone, digoxin, and metoprolol failed to adequately control it.
example.arg: after amiodarone, digoxin, and metoprolol failed to adequately control it.

example.name: Arg1, 2
example.text: They studied the after-effects of chemical cardioversion of SVT with 12 mg of Adenosine.
